meanings.definition: The act of cohostessing a party together.
meanings.sent1: At the gathering, cohostessing made the event more fun.
meanings.sent2: The cohostessing of the birthday celebration was a success.
meanings.sent3: The cohostessing of the picnic turned into a dance party!
meanings.sent4: Their cohostessing was like a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The joy of cohostessing shone through in every detail of the party.

meanings.definition: She cohostessed the event with her friend.
meanings.sent2: Last night, she cohostessed the dinner party elegantly.
meanings.sent3: Cohostessing the talent show was a blast for them.
meanings.sent4: Her cohostessing skills were unmatched in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: Cohostessing allows them to share the workload and have more fun.

meanings.definition: They will cohostess the show next week.
meanings.sent1: Next week, they plan on cohostessing the event smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The duo will cohostess the concert with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent3: Cohostessing the play will be a new experience for them.
meanings.sent4: Their cohostessing will ensure a seamless production.
meanings.sent5: Cohostessing the show together will strengthen their friendship.
